content: this is an advanced beginner pattern prior knowledge of the c2c method may be required there are videos for this stitch method on youtube so not essential pattern updated on 31/1/18 with new pattern format and includes a us terminology pdf this update has been tested however we are all human if you find any faults please let me know so i can rectify thank you there s youtube tutorials for this stitch - get started - https //youtu be/soi0xtxddtg decrease - https //youtu be/gswtxdxxfey
